about.description: Algorithmic Trading Analyst @ Bestex Research | MS in Financial Engineering

education.program: Master of Science in Financial Engineering
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering
education.description: Specialization in Machine Intelligence and Data Science

experience.title: Algorithmic Trading Analyst
description: Onboarded 4 equities and futures clients, reducing setup time by 30% through streamlined processes and leveraging FIX protocol expertise and certifications
Owned and improved the UAT testing environment by automating operational workflows with Python scripts, cutting manual effort by 40%
Certified FIX routes for 4 downstream brokers and venues, ensuring seamless integration and compliance

experience.title: Quantitative Developer Intern
description: Pioneered the development of a robust backtesting system for bitcoin quantitative trading strategies
Optimized critical parameters for trading strategies, leading to a 3% increase in return on investment

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Developed Hiver Chat app's frontend using Vue.js and ReactJS, increasing customer engagement by 2%
Integrated 8 customization features to Hiver Chat app by adding functionality to Hiver Admin Panel using ReactJS
Implemented an interactive analytics dashboard with Vue.js, enabling customers to track chat engagement and customer feedback, resulting in a 5% increase in customers feedback responses

experience.title: Intern Product Developer
description: Implemented product website's landing page using Vue.js achieving 17% boost in user engagement
Built customer feedback section in product website increasing response rates by 7%
Enhanced mobile site responsiveness for 4 different screen resolutions

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Migrated business logic from vanilla JavaScript to firebase cloud functions using Node.js, improving code reusability
Improved security by abstracting essential business logic from the end user, reducing the risk of data breaches by 50%

experience.title: Subject Matter Expert
description: Taught 40 students the course - Building a Computer from First Principles
Created course content for 16 hours of classes over 4 weeks and graded students in final project

projects.title: AI Algorithmic Trading platform
projects.brief: A platform to create, backtest and paper trade equities using automated strategies
description: Trained 150 LSTM models leveraging Pandas, Keras and Django to predict prices of stocks in the NIFTY 50 index using historical stock data
Ran 2000 backtests resulting in 1.2 million (simulated) orders, 600,000 buy/sell signals and 600,000 trades and generated over 2000 paper trades
Published an IEEE research paper after analyzing results of backtests
Visualized strategy performance, backtests and paper trades by building a website utilizing Vue.js

projects.title: Portfolio allocation models comparision
projects.brief: Built 2 variations of factor-based long/short portfolio allocation models
description: Computed estimators of expected returns and covariance for 9 combinations of look back periods on 11 ETFs and SPY index utilizing Python and Pandas
Backtested 90 combinations of models and estimators using computed weekly portfolio rebalancing weights
Utilized metrics computed on all backtests of both models over 6 different time periods to compare performance of both models against SPY index benchmark in various real-world scenarios

projects.title: American Options Pricing Engine
projects.brief: Priced American Options using 2 different methods
description: Designed and implemented an American call and put options pricing engine using binomial and random tree methods
Priced 6 combinations of American options utilizing factory and observer design patterns using C++ and Quantlib

projects.title: Mini JavaScript Compiler
description: Developed a compiler for JavaScript using yacc and lex for lexical analysis, symbol table generation, and syntax validation
Implemented optimization techniques to generate optimized intermediate code from JavaScript programs
Managed assignments, data types, expression evaluation and for loop functionality in JavaScript

projects.title: Binary Options Trading Strategies
projects.brief: Utilized predictions of ML models on stock price direction to trade binary options
description: Trained LSTM, BiLSTM and transformer models on historical data of 5 tech stocks to predict stock price direction
Achieved a maximum accuracy of 70.6% with a BiLSTM model using Python, Pandas and Keras
Backtested models on daily stock market data, which resulted in a 6% return on invested capital over a period of 90 days

projects.title: Equity pairs trading models
projects.brief: Built ML models to predict instances where pairs trading is profitable
description: Sourced stock market data and and found the most correlated and co-integrated stock pairs in the market using pandas
Built and evaluated 24 ML Models - including Linear Regression, ARIMA and LSTMs using keras predicting future prices of chosen stocks
Built a backtester to generate a report with performance metrics to evaluate and improve models
